trans-unit.source: Specifies how principal and identity objects should be created for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 指定應如何為應用程式網域建立 Principal 和 Identity 物件。

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the default principal and identity objects are not created until they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 基於效能考量，預設的主體和 identity 物件才會建立需要它們。

trans-unit.source: If a principal is explicitly added to the current thread, a default principal is not created and the principal policy setting is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果主體明確加入至目前的執行緒時，就不會建立預設的主體和主體的原則設定會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A trusted host can override the default principal policy by specifying another of these values using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A> method of an <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 信任的主控件可以指定覆寫預設主體原則使用這些值的另一個<xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A>方法<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: No principal or identity objects should be created.
trans-unit.target: 不應該建立 Principal 和 Identity 物件。

trans-unit.source: Principal and identity objects for the unauthenticated entity should be created.
trans-unit.target: 應該建立未驗證實體 (Entity) 的 Principal 和 Identity 物件。

trans-unit.source: An unauthenticated entity has <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.Name" /> set to the empty string ("") and <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.IsAuthenticated" /> set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 未驗證實體具有設定為空字串 ("") 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.Name" /> 和設定為 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.IsAuthenticated" />。

trans-unit.source: Principal and identity objects that reflect the operating system token associated with the current execution thread should be created, and the associated operating system groups should be mapped into roles.
trans-unit.target: 應該建立反映與目前所執行的執行緒相關聯作業系統 Token 的 Principal 和 Identity 物件，並且相關聯的作業系統群組應該對應至角色。
